trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Gilford
There were no other sightings in Gilford on or around July 15th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsSo i know this was a few years ago but i honestly didnt know i could make a report like this. i worked at a golf course. i was out on one of the tees by myself doing divots by filling them in with grass seed and dirt. using a tool similar to a rake i was spreading the seed. as i was doing this i was observing the numerois dragonflys around me and watching their shadows as i worked. out of the corner of my eye i notice the shadow of a small circle about the size of a golf ball with 3 others revolving around the center one. they werent revolving fast.. what was strange about this was that the object appeared transparent so did the 3 around the center one. it looked like a piece of glass if you were to hold it in the sunlight and observe its shadow. another odd thing was the 3 revolving around the center seemed to have a heat signature that dissipated as they revolved. i only sw this object for a few seconds. And never saw the object directly. only its shadow. my initial reation was that someone was playing a prank on me so i turned around fast only to find no one was around. when i looked back down the object was gone. after for the rest of the day i felt as though i were being watched. the object did not move other than the 3 around the center.
Summary: strange transparent orb surrounded by 3 other slightly smaller orbs circling the middle one
